description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. To avoid being YAKITORI, chickens attack back!  Can Haruka Higashiyama, who's been cleaning the kitchen alone, take hold of this large flock of chickens? It's an exhilarating action game that you'll be smashing a huge flock of rampaging chickens using various weapons.
description.short: To avoid being YAKITORI, chickens attack back!  Can Haruka Higashiyama, who's been cleaning the kitchen alone, take hold of this large flock of chickens? It's an exhilarating action game that you'll be smashing a huge flock of rampaging chickens using various weapons.
